title: Collision between a car and a motorbike in Żurrieq
content: Today, at around 0930hrs, the Police were informed of a traffic accident on Triq il-Belt Valletta, Żurrieq.The Police immediately went to the scene and from a preliminary investigation it resulted that a collision had occurred between a Toyota Aqua driven by a 67-year-old woman resident of Żurrieq and a Piaggio Beverly motorbike driven by a 61-year-old man from Mqabba.A medical team was called to the scene and an ambulance took the motorbike driver to Mater Dei Hospital, where he was certified to be seriously injured.Magistrate Dr Monica Borg Galea LL.D was informed and appointed an inquiry while Police investigations are still ongoing.

title: Car-motorcycle traffic accident
content: Yesterday, at around 1830hrs, the Police were informed of a traffic accident in Triq Dawret il-Gudja, Gudja.Preliminary investigations showed that a collision occurred between a Honda fit that was being driven by a 64-year-old man from Santa Luċija and a Kawasaki Ninja motorcycle that was being driven by a 23-year-old man from Gudja.A medical team was called on site and an ambulance took the motorcyclist to Mater Dei Hospital. He was later certified to have sustained grievous injuries.Police investigations are ongoing.

title: Car-motorcycle collision in Ħal Qormi
content: Today, at around 0800hrs, the Police were informed of a traffic accident in Valley Road, Qormi.Preliminary investigations showed that a collision occurred between a Ford Transit driven by a 34-year-old man residing in Żebbuġ and a Honda motorcycle driven by a 29-year-old man who lives in Qormi.A medical team was called on site and an ambulance took the motorcyclist to Mater Dei Hospital. He was later certified to have sustained grievous injuries.Police investigations are ongoing.

title: Collision between motorcycle and car in Għaxaq
content: Yesterday, at around 1800hrs, the Police were informed of a traffic accident in Triq Dawret Ħal Għaxaq, Għaxaq.Preliminary investigations by the Police found that there was a collision between a Volvo XC60 that was being driven by a 42-year-old man from Għaxaq and a Malaguti Madison motorcycle that was being driven by a 29-year-old Brazilian man from Zurrieq.A medical team was called on site and an ambulance took the motorcyclist to Mater Dei Hospital for treatment where he was later certified to have sustained grievous injuries.Police investigations are ongoing.

title: Car-motorcycle collision
content: Yesterday, at around quarter to nine in the evening (2045hrs), the Police were informed of a traffic accident in Triq il-Buqana, Rabat.Preliminary investigations showed that a collision occurred between a Kia Avella driven by a 25-year-old man from Santa Luċija and a Kymco Agility motorcycle driven by a 41-year-old man from Birkirkara.A medical team was called on site and an ambulance took the motorcyclist to Mater Dei Hospital. He was later certified to have sustained grievous injuries.Police investigations are ongoing.

title: Traffic accident in Marsa
content: Yesterday, at around ten minutes to nine in the morning (0850 hrs), the Police were informed of a traffic accident in Triq Aldo Moro, Marsa.Preliminary investigations by the District Police found that a collision occurred between a Yamaha motorcycle driven by a 36-year-old man from Cospicua, an Isuzu Elf van driven by a 52-year-old man from Fgura and a Hyundai Kona driven by a 53-year-old man from Żabbar.A medical team was called on site to assist and an ambulance took the motorcyclist to Mater Dei Hospital for treatment. He was later certified to have sustained grievous injuries.Police investigations in connection with this incident are ongoing.

title: Van-car collision in Lija
content: Today, at around 1030hrs, the Police were informed of a traffic accident in Mosta Road, Lija.The Police immediately went to the scene and from a preliminary investigation it resulted that a collision had occurred between a Renault Trafic van driven by a 24-year-old man residing in Mtarfa and a Suzuki Swift driven by an 81-year-old man residing in Mosta. In the Suzuki, there was also a 79-year-old woman who lives in Mosta.Members of the Civil Protection Department were called to the scene, as well as a medical team, and ambulances took all the people to Mater Dei Hospital to be given the necessary treatment.Unfortunately, the woman was certified dead a short time later while the other elderly man is in a serious condition. The other man was certified with slight injuries.Magistrate Dr Ian Farrugia LL.D was informed of the case and appointed an inquiry while Police investigations are ongoing.

title: Zejtun traffic accident
content: This morning, at around 0815 hrs, the Police were informed of a traffic accident in Triq tal-Barrani, Żejtun.Preliminary investigations showed that a collision occurred between a Peugeot Tweet driven by a 66-year-old man from Zabbar and a Kawazaki motorcycle driven by a 30-year-old woman who lives in Marsaxlokk.A medical team was called on site and an ambulance took both drivers to Mater Dei Hospital for treatment. The man was later certified as suffering from serious injuries while the woman was certified as suffering from grievous injuries.Police investigations are ongoing.

title: Motorcyclist injured in traffic accident
content: On wednesday the 11th of June, at around four in the afternoon (1545 hrs), the Police were informed of a traffic accident in John Adye Street, Naxxar.Preliminary investigations showed that a collision occurred between a Honda motorcycle driven by a 35-year-old man from Bosnia and Herzegovina and a resident of Għargħur and an Isuzu Rodeo driven by a 59-year-old man from Marsa.A medical team was called on site and an ambulance took the motorcyclist to Mater Dei where he was later certified to have sustained grievous injuries.Police investigations are ongoing.

title: Number of persons hospitalised following Żabbar accident
content: Today, at around quarter past nine in the morning (0915 hrs), assistance was requested in St James Square, Zabbar after a vehicle hit a number of people.The Police went immediately on site together with a number of ambulances and members of the Civil Protection Department.It resulted from initial investigations that a 79-year-old man, from Zabbar, lost control of the vehicle he was driving and accidentally hit some persons. He was taken to Mater Dei Hospital for observation, but it was later confirmed that he was not injured.Four women, aged 39, 66, 77 and 84, and two men aged 36 and 81, all residing in Zabbar, were taken to Mater Dei Hospital by ambulances. The 84-year-old woman was later certified as suffering from grievous injuries and the others were certified as suffering from slight injuries. Three other persons were treated at the scene of the accident.Police investigations in connection with this incident are ongoing.

title: Motorcycle accident in Naxxar
content: This morning at around 0800hrs, a 40-year-old man from Ħaż-Żabbar, was hospitalised at Mater Dei following a traffic accident along the Coast Road in Naxxar.Preliminary investigations showed that the man was riding a Honda CBR motorcycle, lost control and crashed.He was assisted by a medical team and taken to hospital by an ambulance. Later he was certified with serious injuries.Magistrate Dr Joseph Mifsud LL.D was informed about the case and appointed a Magisterial Inquiry whilst Police investigation is still on going.

title: Italian woman grievously injured in a traffic accident
content: An Italian woman was taken to Mater Dei Hospital for some injuries she suffered in a traffic accident in Cospicua Seafront, Cospicua at around 1300hrs.It resulted from initial investigations that the victim was hit by a Nissan March, which was being driven by a 48-year-old man from Kalkara.The woman was assisted by a medical team, taken to hospital by an ambulance and certified to have sustained grievous injuries.Police investigations are ongoing.

title: Woman grievously injured in traffic accident
content: A 32-year-old woman who lives in Għajnsielem, Gozo, at around 1015hrs, was taken to Mater Dei Hospital because she was injured in a traffic accident in Żabbar Road, Fgura.Preliminary investigations showed that the victim was hit by a Ford Fiesta, which was being driven by a 78-year-old man residing in Marsascala.The woman was assisted by a medical team, taken to hospital by ambulance and certified to have sustained grievous injuries.Police investigations are ongoing.

title: Xewkija traffic accident
content: Yesterday evening, at around ten (2200 hrs), the Police were informed of a traffic accident in Triq Sant ‘Elizabetta, Xewkija.From initial investigations it appears that a 64-year-old man from Xagħra was riding a Kentoya motorcycle when he crashed into a barrier and fell off.He was assisted by a medical team and taken by ambulance to the Gozo General Hospital. He was later certified to have sustained grievous injuries.Police investigations are ongoing.

title: Woman grievously injured in traffic accident
content: A 77-year-old woman residing in Valletta, at around 0830hrs, was taken to Mater Dei Hospital because she was injured in a traffic accident in Sa Maison Street, Tal-Pietà.Preliminary investigations showed that the victim was hit by a Hyundai I10, which was being driven by a 75-year-old man residing in Tas-Sliema.The woman was assisted by a medical team, taken to hospital by ambulance and certified that she was grievously injured.Police investigations are ongoing.

title: Man grievously injured in a traffic accident
content: An 80-year-old man, a resident of Santa Luċija, was taken to Mater Dei Hospital for some injuries he sustained in a traffic accident in Luqa Road, Luqa.It resulted from initial investigations that the victim was hit by Nissan NV 200, which was being driven by a 22-year-old man from Għaxaq.The man was assisted by a medical team, taken to hospital by an ambulance and later certified to have sustained grievous injuries.Police investigations are ongoing.

title: Traffic accident in Paola
content: Two persons were injured in a collision which occurred early this morning in Triq il-Baċir, Paola.At around half past seven 0730hrs, when the Police were informed of a traffic accident in which a Toyota Ractis driver, an 80-year-old man from Paola, lost control and crashed into a wall. Another 80-year-old man from Paola was also a passenger in the same vehicle.A medical team was called on site and an ambulance took the two men to Mater Dei Hospital. They were later certified to have sustained grievous injuries.Police investigations into the accident are ongoing.

title: Girl grievously injured in a traffic accident
content: A 13-year-old girl, at around 1015hrs, was taken to Mater Dei Hospital after being injured in a traffic accident in Triq Sir Philip Pullicino, Mtarfa.Preliminary investigations showed that the girl, who was riding a bicycle, was hit by a Ford B Max that was being driven by a 25-year-old man from Mtarfa.The girl was assisted by a medical team, taken to hospital by an ambulance and later certified to have sustained grievous injuries.Police investigations are ongoing

title: A collission in Floriana
content: A 61-year-old coachman was grievously injured in an accident which occurred at around 1330 hrs in Triq Nazzjonali, Floriana.Preliminary investigations showed that a collision took place between a coachman who resides in Qormi and a Peugeot 508 driven by a 31-year-old man from Cospicua.A medical team was called on site and an ambulance took the man to Mater Dei Hospital. He was later certified to have sustained grievous injuries.Police investigations into the accident are ongoing.

title: Man seriously injured in traffic accident
content: A 54-year-old man, a resident of Marsa, sustained serious injuries after he was involved in a traffic accident in Triq il-Perit Dom Mintoff, Paola yesterday at around 9pm (2100 hrs).From initial investigations it appears that for some reason the driver who was driving a Honda Fit lost control and crashed into an electricity pole.A medical team assisted the man and was taken to Mater Dei Hospital by ambulance.Magistrate Dr Monica Borg Galea LL.D. was informed and appointed an inquiry while Police investigations in connection with this incident are ongoing.

title: Man grievously injured in traffic accident
content: Yesterday, at around quarter past three in the afternoon (1515 hrs), the Police were informed of a traffic accident in Triq Emmanuele Luigi Galizia, Marsa.Preliminary investigations showed that a collision occurred between a Daelim motorcycle driven by a 55-year-old man from Birżebbuġa and a BMW 318 driven by a 33-year-old woman from Luqa. A 74-year-old man from Luqa was passenger in the car.The motorcyclist was assisted by a medical team and taken to Mater Dei Hospital by ambulance, where he was later certified to have sustained grievous injuries.Police investigations are ongoing.

title: Traffic accident in Gudja
content: Yesterday, at around (1945hrs), the police were informed of a traffic accident in Dawret il-Gudja, Gudja.Preliminary investigations showed that a collision occurred between a Skoda Fabia driven by a 50-year-old man from Gudja and a Ford Fiesta, who at the time was on the side of the road with a puncture.At the time of the impact, a 29-year-old man from Birzebbugia was injured after he was trapped between the two vehicles.The victim was assisted by a medical team, taken to Mater Dei Hospital by ambulance and certified with serious injuries.Magistrate Dr Ian Farrugia LL. D was informed of the case and appointed an inquiry.Civil Protection Department personnel were also on site to assist.Police investigations are still ongoing.

title: Man grievously injured in traffic accident
content: A 53-year-old man who lives in Msida, at around 1000hrs, was taken to Mater Dei Hospital because he was injured in a traffic accident in Triq L. Zamenhof corner with Triq Xmiexi, Msida.Preliminary investigations showed that the man was hit by a Ford Transit, which was being driven by a 24-year-old man also residing in Msida.The man was assisted by a medical team, taken to hospital by ambulance and certified to have sustained grievous injuries.Police investigations are ongoing.

title: Traffic accident in Birżebbuġa
content: Today, at around 1315 hrs, the Police were informed of a traffic accident in Triq Għar Dalam, Birżebbuġa.Preliminary investigations showed that a collision occurred between a Peugeot partner that was being driven by a 23-year-old Albanian from Birżebbuġa and a Honda NSS motorcycle that was being driven by a 34-year-old man from Zejtun.A medical team was called on site and an ambulance took the biker to Mater Dei Hospital. He was later certified to have sustained grievous injuries.Police investigations into the accident are ongoing.

title: Marsa traffic accident
content: Today, at about 0745hrs, the Police were informed of a traffic accident in Triq Diċembru Tlettax, Marsa.The Police went immediately on site and preliminary investigations showed that a 36-year-old Turkish national, resident in Zabbar, lost control of the Toyota Vitz he was driving and crashed into the barriers and a pole.The victim was assisted by a medical team, taken to Mater Dei Hospital by ambulance and certified to have sustained grievous injuries.Civil Protection Department personnel were also on site to assist.Police investigations are still ongoing.

title: Motorcycle accident in Marsa
content: A 43-year-old Nepalese man and residing in Msida, at around 1430hrs, was taken to Mater Dei Hospital because he was injured in a traffic accident in December 13 Road, Marsa.Preliminary investigations showed that the man was riding a Kymco motorcycle, lost control and crashed into a pole.He was assisted by a medical team, taken to hospital by ambulance and certified to have sustained serious injuries.Magistrate Dr Ian Farrugia LL.D was informed of the case and appointed an inquiry, while Police investigations are ongoing

title: Attard fatal accident
content: A 25-year-old man, a resident of Mtarfa, lost his life late last night in a traffic accident in Attard.The accident occurred at around 2120hrs in Triq L-Imdina.Preliminary investigations showed that the victim was driving a Mercedes, lost control and as a result the car crashed into a tree. Police, medical teams from Mater Dei and members of the Civil Protection Department were immediately called on site. Unfortunately, the man was certified dead on the spot.Magistrate Dr Ian Farrugia LL.D appointed an inquiry assisted by various experts, while Police investigations in connection with this incident are still ongoing.

title: Traffic accident in Gudja
content: Late yesterday evening, at around 11:00 p.m. (2300hrs), the Police were informed of a traffic accident in Triq Dawret il-Gudja, Gudja.Police immediately went to the scene, and from preliminary investigations it resulted that a collision had occurred between a Suzuki Baleno driven by a 49-year-old man from Swieqi and a Hyundai Getz driven by a 19-year-old from San Ġwann. Followwing the intial impact, the Hyundai veered into the opposite lane and collided with a Renault Captur.The Renault was driven by a 50-year-old man. Also inside the vehicle were two women aged 69 and 43, as well as a 14-year-old girl and a 14-year-old boy, all residents of Rabat.A medical team was called to the scene, and an ambulance took the 43-year-old woman together with the two children to Mater Dei Hospital. Later, the 14-year-old boy was certified to have suffered grievous injuries, while the girl and the 43-year-old woman suffered slight injuries.Police investigations into this accident are still ongoing.

title: Car-motorcycle collision in Marsa
content: Today, at around 0730hrs, the Police were informed of a traffic accident in Xatt l-Għassara tal-Għeneb, il-Marsa.Preliminary investigations showed that a collision occurred between a Ford Fiesta driven by a 39-year-old man residing in Xgħajra and a Honda motorcycle driven by a 35-year-old woman who lives in Dingli.A medical team was called on site and an ambulance took the motorcyclist to Mater Dei Hospital, where she was certified to have sustained grievous injuries.Police investigations are ongoing.

title: Man suffers serious injuries in traffic accident
content: A 52-year-old man from Żurrieq, at around 2330hrs, was taken to Mater Dei Hospital after suffering injuries in a traffic accident in a parking lot on Triq il-Mina ta’ Hompesch, Ħaż-Żabbar.Initial investigations revealed that the victim was hit by a Toyota Vitz, which was being driven by a 26-year-old man resident in Kalkara.The man was treated by a medical team, taken to hospital by ambulance and certified as having suffered serious injuries.Magistrate Dr Philip Galea Farrugia LL.D was informed of the case and an inquiry was opened, while investigations by the Police are still ongoing.

title: Car-motorcycle collision in St Paul’s Bay
content: Today, at around 1330hrs, the Police were informed of a traffic accident in Triq Burmarrad, St Paul’s Bay.Preliminary investigations showed that a collision occurred between a Mazda Demio driven by a 31-year-old Czech Republic woman residing in Mosta and a Piaggio motorcycle driven by a 72-year-old man who lives in Birkirkara.A medical team was called on site and an ambulance took the motorcyclist to Mater Dei Hospital. He was later certified to have sustained grievous injuries.Police investigations are ongoing.

title: Car-motorcycle collision in Mosta
content: Yesterday, at around 1800hrs, the Police were informed of a traffic accident in Triq iż-Żejfa, Mosta.Preliminary investigations showed that a collision occurred between a Kia Sportage driven by a 34-year-old woman from Rabat and a Suzuki motorcycle driven by a 30-year-old Indian man who lives in Birkirkara.A medical team was called on site and an ambulance took the man to Mater Dei Hospital, where he was certified to be seriously injured.Magistrate Dr Joseph Mifsud LL.D was informed about the case who appointed an inquiry, while Police investigations are ongoing.

title: Car-motorcycle collision in Żejtun
content: Today, at around 0930hrs, the Police were informed of a traffic accident in Tal-Barrani Road, Żejtun.The Police went immediately on site and preliminary investigations showed that a collision had occurred between a Mazda Demio driven by a 46-year-old man residing in Żejtun and a Honda motorcycle driven by a 79-year-old man also living in Żejtun.A medical team was called on site and an ambulance took the motorcyclist to Mater Dei Hospital. He was later certified to have sustained grievous injuries.Police investigations are ongoing.

title: Traffic accident in Santa Venera
content: A 22-year-old man and residing in Rabat, at around 1745hrs, was taken to Mater Dei Hospital because she was injured in a traffic accident in Regional Road, Santa Venera.Preliminary investigations showed that a collision occurred between a Toyota Vitz driven by a 19-year-old woman residing in Żurrieq and a Honda motorcycle driven by the victim.She was assisted by a medical team, taken to hospital by ambulance and certified to have sustained grievous injuries.Police investigations are ongoing.

title: Fatal accident in Żebbuġ
content: On Thursday 19th June, at around ten in the evening (2200 hrs), the Police were informed of a traffic accident in Triq L-Imdina, Ħaż-Żebbuġ.Initial investigations showed that a collision occurred between a Renault Captur driven by a 57-year-old man from Dingli and a Honda Civic driven by a 32-year-old man from Luqa. A 28-year-old woman, a resident of Attard, was a passenger in the Honda.They were assisted by a medical team and members of the Civil Protection Department.All persons were taken to Mater Dei Hospital by ambulance. Shortly afterwards, the 32-year-old man was certified dead.The other man and the woman sustained grievous injuries.Magistrate Dr Antoine Agius Bonnici LL. D was informed of the case and appointed an inquiry.Police investigations are ongoing.

title: Motorcycle accident in St Paul’s Bay
content: A 44-year-old Japanese woman who resides in Birkirkara, at around 1930hrs, was taken to Mater Dei Hospital because she was injured in a traffic accident in Triq San Pawl, St Paul’s Bay.Preliminary investigations showed that a 44-year-old German man who lives in St Julian’s was driving a Voge 300Rally motorcycle, lost control and fell. The woman was a pillion rider on the motorcycle.They were assisted by a medical team, and the woman was taken to hospital by ambulance where she was certified to have sustained grievous injuries.Police investigations are ongoing.

title: Woman grievously injured in traffic accident
content: An 87-year-old woman who lives in Naxxar, at around 0900hrs, was taken to Mater Dei Hospital because she was injured in a traffic accident in Triq San Pawl, Naxxar.Preliminary investigations showed that the victim was hit by a Smart, which was being driven by a30-year-old man residing in Fgura.The woman was assisted by a medical team, taken to hospital by ambulance and certified to have sustained grievous injuries.Police investigations are ongoing.

title: Man grievously injured in traffic accident
content: A 75-year-old man who lives in Zabbar, at around 1600hrs of yesterday afternoon, was taken to Mater Dei Hospital because he was injured in a traffic accident in Luqa Road, Paola.Preliminary investigations showed that the man was hit by a Nissan March, which was being driven by a 29-year-old man residing in Santa Lucija.The elderly man was assisted by a medical team, taken to hospital by ambulance and certified to have sustained grievous injuries.Police investigations are ongoing.

title: Gozo traffic accident
content: Today, at around 0800 hrs, the Police were informed of a traffic accident in Triq Marsalforn, Żebbuġ, Gozo.From initial investigations, it showed that an 82-year-old man from Ħaż-Żabbar lost control of the Toyota Corolla he was driving and crashed into a wall. An 81-year-old woman from Santa Venera was also in the vehicle.The woman was assisted by a medical team on site and taken to Gozo General Hospital by an ambulance, where she was certified to have sustained grievous injuries.The Police are carrying out investigations.

title: Fatal motorcycle accident
content: A 36-year-old Italian man, residing in Birkirkara, lost his life late last night in a traffic accident in Msida.The accident happened at around 2015hrs in Mikiel Anton Vassalli Street.From initial investigations it appears that the man was riding a Honda motorcycle and while he was in the tunnel, he lost control, crashed into the wall and fell.The victim was immediately assisted by a medical team and taken to Mater Dei Hospital by ambulance. Unfortunately, he was certified dead shortly afterwards.Magistrate Dr Philip Galea Farrugia LL. D was informed of the case and appointed an inquiry.Police investigations are still ongoing.

title: Traffic accident in Iklin
content: Today, at around midnight (0000 hrs), the Police were informed of a traffic accident in Valley Road, Iklin.From preliminary investigations it resulted that a collision occurred between a Toyota Passo driven by a 42-year-old woman from St Paul’s Bay and a Keeway motorcycle driven by a 39-year-old man from Lija.The motorcyclist was assisted by a medical team and taken to Mater Dei Hospital by ambulance. He was later certified to have sustained grievous injuries.The Police are investigating the case.

title: Car-motorcycle collision
content: Yesterday, at around 1800hrs, the Police were informed of a traffic accident in Triq Ħompesch, Fgura.Preliminary investigations showed that a collision occurred between a Chevrolet Aveo that was being driven by a 32-year-old Albanian man from Fgura and a Kawazaki ZR750 motorcycle that was being driven by a 45-year-old Italian man from Marsascala.A medical team was called on site and an ambulance took the motorcyclist to Mater Dei Hospital. He was later certified to have sustained grievous injuries.Police investigations into the accident are ongoing.

title: Woman grievously injured in traffic accident
content: A 75-year-old woman who lives in Marsascala, at around 0945hrs, was taken to Mater Dei Hospital because she was injured in a traffic accident in Triq Sant’Antnin, Marsascala.Preliminary investigations showed that the victim was hit by a Mazda Demio, which was being driven by a 54-year-old woman residing in Marsascala aswell.The woman was assisted by a medical team, taken to hospital by ambulance and certified to have sustained grievous injuries.Police investigations are ongoing.

title: Fatal motorcycle accident
content: A 27-year-old man who lives in Paola, lost his life early this morning in a traffic accident in Pembroke.The accident happened at around 0100hrs) in Triq Sant’Andrija.Preliminary investigations showed that a collision occurred between a BMW 1 series driven by a 22-year-old man residing in St Paul’s Bay and a Honda motorcycle driven by the victim.The motorcyclist was immediately assisted by a medical team and taken to Mater Dei Hospital by ambulance. Unfortunately, he was certified dead shortly afterwards.Magistrate Dr Ian Farrugia LL.D was informed of the case and appointed an inquiry.Police investigations into this incident are ongoing.

title: Gozo traffic accident
content: Yesterday, at around 2115hrs, the Police were informed of a traffic accident in Triq Borġ Għarib, Għajnsielem.Preliminary investigations showed that a 22-year-old Albanian, a resident of Żebbuġ, Gozo, lost control of his Renault Megane and crashed into a wall.A medical team was called on site and an ambulance took the driver to Gozo General Hospital where he was certified to have sustained grievous injuries.Police investigations are ongoing.

title: Collision between a bus and a van in St Julian’s
content: This morning, at around 1030hrs, the Police were informed about a traffic accident in Triq Mikiel Anton Vassalli, St Julian’s.Preliminary investigations by the Police showed that there was a collision between an Otokar Vectio bus that was being driven by a 37-year-old man from Marsaskala and a Ford Tourneo Courier van that was being driven by a 39-year-old woman from Naxxar.The bus driver was assisted by a medical team and taken to Mater Dei Hospital by an ambulance for further treatment. He was later certified as suffering from serious injuries. The woman of the other vehicle was not injured.Magistrate Dr Philip Galea Farrugia LL.D was informed of the case and appointed an inquiry, while Police investigations are ongoing.

title: Persons injured in separate traffic accidents
content: Two men were taken to Mater Dei Hospital after being injured in two separate traffic accidents earlier today.The first accident occurred at around 0500hrs, in Hal Farrug Road, Luqa. Preliminary investigations showed that a 34-year-old man from Qrendi was driving a Ford Fiesta, lost control and crashed into an electricity pole.The second incident happened for about the 1245hrs, in D’ Argens Street, Gzira. Preliminary investigations showed that a collision occurred between a Yamaha YB125 motorcycle driven by a 59-year-old man residing in Fgura and a Mazda Demio driven by a 30-year-old man residing in Birkirkara.A medical team assisted in both incidents and the two men aged 34 and 59 years were taken to hospital by ambulance for medical treatment, where they were certified to have sustained grievous injuries.Police investigations are ongoing.

title: Traffic accident in Gozo
content: Today, at around 1245hrs, the Police were informed of a traffic accident in Giorgio Borg Olivier Street, Victoria, Gozo.The Police went immediately on site and preliminary investigations showed that a Kia Ceed driven by a 21-year-old man residing in Qala, Gozo, overturned after crashing into a wall.A medical team and Civil Protection personnel were called on site to assist, and an ambulance took the man to Gozo General Hospital for treatment. He was later certified with serious injuries.Magistrate Dr Simone Grech LL.D was informed of the case and appointed an inquiry.Police investigations into this incident are ongoing.

title: Traffic accident in Naxxar
content: Update:Bothdrivers and the double decker passengers were certified with slight injuries.The Magisterial Inquiry and Police investigations are ongoing.Earlier:Today, at around 1515 hrs, the Police were informed of a traffic accident along the Coast Road in Naxxar.Preliminary investigations by the District Police found that a collision occurred between a Volvo double decker and a Jaguar XF. The Jaguar was being driven by an 81-year-old man from Zebbug who was accompanied by an 80-year-old woman, also from Zebbug. The double decker was being driven by a 39-year-old Kenyan national who lives in Zurrieq and was carrying a number of passengers.A medical team and Civil Protection personnel were called to the scene to assist. Ambulances took the two drivers, the elderly woman as well as three women who were on the double decker, to Mater Dei Hospital for treatment.Later, the 80-year-old woman was certified as suffering from grievous injuries while the conditions of the other persons are still pending.Magistrate Antione Agius Bonnici LL.D was informed and appointed an inquiry while Police investigations are ongoing.

title: Naxxar traffic accident
content: Today, at around 1015hrs, the Police were informed of a traffic accident in Triq il-Fortizza tal-Mosta, Naxxar.Preliminary investigations showed that a collision occurred between a Vauxhall driven by a 45-year-old woman from Naxxar and a Daelim motorcycle driven by a 34-year-old man from Mosta.The man was assisted by a medical team and taken to Mater Dei Hospital by ambulance for further medical attention. He was later certified to have sustained grievous injuries.Police investigations are ongoing.

title: Man injured in traffic accident
content: Yesterday, at around 2115hrs, the Police were informed of a traffic accident in Kennedy Drive, St Paul’s Bay.The Police went immediately on site and preliminary investigations showed that a man, a 21-year-old Nepalese national residing in St Paul’s Bay, was injured after the Peugeot Tweet motorcycle he was riding was allegedly hit by a vehicle that was driven away from the scene.A medical team was called on site and an ambulance took the man to Mater Dei where he was certified to have sustained grievous injuries.Police investigations are ongoing.

title: Woman grievously injured in a traffic accident
content: An 84-year-old woman, a resident of Naxxar, was hospitalised at 0930 hrs after being injured in a traffic accident in Triq il-Kappella Ta’ Xagħra, Naxxar.It resulted from initial investigations that the victim was hit by Hyundai Excel, that was being driven by an 84-year-old man from Naxxar.The woman was assisted by a medical team and taken to hospital by ambulance, where she was certified to be suffering from grievous injuries.Police investigations are ongoing.

title: Motorcycle accident in Mgarr
content: A 33-year-old Indian national and residing in San Ġwann, at around 1900hrs of yesterday evening, was taken to Mater Dei Hospital because he was injured in a traffic accident in Mosta Road, Mġarr.Preliminary investigations showed that the man was riding a Honda motorcycle, lost control and fell.He was assisted by a medical team, taken to hospital by ambulance and certified to have sustained grievous injuries.Police investigations are ongoing.

title: Man grievously injured in traffic accident
content: Yesterday, at half past two in the afternoon (1430 hrs), the Police were informed of a traffic accident along the Coast Road, in Naxxar.Preliminary investigations showed that a 46-year-old man from Fgura lost control of his Suzuki motorcycle, fell and crashed into a BMW which was being driven on the opposite lane by a 30-year-old man from St Paul’s Bay.The motorcyclist was assisted by a medical team and taken to Mater Dei Hospital by ambulance. He was later certified to have sustained grievous injuries.The Police are investigating the case.

title: 3 persons injured in separate traffic accidents
content: Three persons were taken to Mater Dei Hospital, yesterday, after they were injured in two separate traffic accidents.The first accident occurred at around 1130 hrs, in Salina Street, Naxxar. Preliminary investigations showed that a collision occurred between a Nooma Bravo GLE motorcycle driven by a 48-year-old Bulgarian from St Paul’s Bay and a Hyundai I10 driven by a 60-year-old Spaniard.The second accident occurred at 1230 hrs in Cospicua Road, Zabbar. Preliminary investigations showed that a collision occurred between a Fiat Scudo driven by a 23-year-old man from Kirkop and a Honda NSS motorcycle driven by a 45-year-old man from Żabbar. An 8-year-old boy was also on the bike.A medical team assisted in the two incidents and the motorcyclists and the 8-year-old boy were taken to hospital by an ambulance for medical treatment. Later, they were certified to have sustained grievous injuries.Police investigations are ongoing.

title: Motorcycle-truck collision in Żejtun
content: Today, at around noon, the Police were informed of a traffic accident in Triq il-Ħotba, Żejtun.Preliminary investigations showed that a collision occurred between a Honda motorcycle driven by a 62-year-old woman residing in Ħamrun and an Isuzu truck driven by a 25-year-old Indian man residing in Luqa.The woman was assisted by a medical team and taken to Mater Dei Hospital by ambulance, where she was certified to have sustained grievous injuries.Police investigations are still ongoing.

title: Motorcyclist seriously injured
content: Yesterday, at around four in the afternoon (1600 hrs), the Police were informed of a traffic accident along the Coast Road, Naxxar.Preliminary investigations showed that a collision occurred between a Toyota Aygo driven by a 44-year-old woman from St Paul’s Bay and a CF Moto motorcycle driven by a 53-year-old man from Belgium who lives in Gzira.A medical team was called on site and an ambulance took the motorcyclist to Mater Dei Hospital for treatment where he was later certified to have sustained serious injuries.Magistrate Dr Monica Borg Galea LL. D was informed of the case and opened a Magisterial Inquiry while Police investigations are ongoing.

title: Woman grievously injured in traffic accident
content: A 29-year-old Spanish woman, at around 1215hrs, was taken to the Gozo General Hospital because she was injured in a traffic accident in Republic Street, Victoria, Gozo.Preliminary investigations showed that the victim was hit by Mazda 2, which was being driven by a woman a 64-year-old resident of Rabat, Gozo.The woman was assisted by a medical team, taken to hospital by ambulance and certified that she was grievously injured.Police investigations are ongoing.

title: Traffic accident in St Julian’s
content: Yesterday, at around 1530hrs, the Police were informed about a traffic accident in Mikiel Anton Vassalli Street, St Julian’s.Preliminary investigations showed that a 28-year-old man from Żejtun lost control of the BMW he was driving and overturned. A 25-year-old man from Zejtun was also in the vehicle.The 25-year-old was assisted by a medical team, taken to Mater Dei Hospital by an ambulance and certified to have sustained grievous injuries.Members of the Civil Protection Department were also on site to assist.The Police are investigating the case.

title: Fatal motorcycle accident
content: A 35-year-old man and residing in Qormi, lost his life today afternoon in a traffic accident in St Paul’s Bay.The accident happened at around 1230hrs in St Paul’s Bay BypassFrom initial investigations it appears that the man was riding a Suzuki motorcycle direction to Xemxija, when he lost control and crashed into the barriers.The victim was immediately assisted by a medical team but unfortunately, he was certified dead on site.Magistrate Dr Ian Farrugia LL.D was informed of the case and appointed an inquiry.Police investigations are still ongoing.

title: Traffic accident in Mosta
content: A 46-year-old motorcyclist resident in Rabat, was seriously injured early this morning in a traffic accident in Mosta.The accident happened at around 0200hrs in Triq iż-Żejfa.Preliminary investigations showed that a collision occurred between a BMW motorcycle being driven by a Transport Malta official and a Peugeot 206 driven by a 54-year-old man residing in Naxxar.A medical team was immediately summoned to assist the officer and was then taken to Mater Dei Hospital by ambulance.Magistrate Dr Philip Galea Farrugia LL.D was informed of the case and appointed an inquiry.Police investigations are still ongoing.

title: Car-motorcycle collision in Marsa
content: Today, at around 0715hrs, the Police were informed of a traffic accident in Aldo Moro Street, Marsa.Preliminary investigations showed that a collision occurred between a Toyota Aygo driven by a 65-year-old man residing in San Ġwann and a Yamaha GPD125-A motorcycle driven by a 37-year-old Albanian man who lives in St Paul’s Bay.A medical team was called on site and an ambulance took the motorcyclist to Mater Dei Hospital. He was later certified to have sustained grievous injuries.Police investigations are ongoing.

title: Woman grievously injured in traffic accident
content: A 44-year-old woman who lives in Balzan, at around 0815hrs, was taken to Mater Dei Hospital because she was injured in a traffic accident in Triq il-Kannizzata, Balzan.Preliminary investigations showed that the victim was hit by a Mazda Demio, which was being driven by a 23-year-old woman residing in Attard.The woman was assisted by a medical team, taken to hospital by ambulance and certified to have sustained grievous injuries.Police investigations are ongoing.

title: Cyclist grievously injured in San Gwann accident
content: Today, at about (1045hrs), the Police were informed that their assistance was needed in Tal-Balal Road, San Gwann.The Police went immediately on site and there it resulted that an accident had occurred between a bike, on which there was a 33-year-old Italian man, and a DAF truck, which was being driven by a 32-year-old man residing in Mosta.The cyclist was assisted by a medical team, taken to Mater Dei Hospital by ambulance and certified to have sustained grievous injuries.Police investigations are ongoing.

title: Traffic collision
content: Yesterday, at around 1830 hrs, the Police were informed of a traffic accident in Mikiel Anton Vassalli Street, Msida.Preliminary investigations showed that a collision occurred between a Smart that was being driven by a 40-year-old Italian resident in Mosta and a Honda WW125 motorcycle that was being driven by a 45-year-old man who lives in Hamrun.A medical team was called on site and an ambulance took the man to Mater Dei hospital where he was certified to have sustained grievous injuries.The Police are carrying out investigations.

title: Man grievously injured in traffic accident
content: A 70-year-old man residing in St Julian’s, at around 1415hrs, was taken to Gozo General Hospital because he was injured in a traffic accident in Republic Street, Victoria, Gozo.Preliminary investigations showed that the victim was hit by a Lintex HT125T-28 motorcycle, which was being driven by a 58-year-old man residing in Rabat, Gozo.The men were assisted by a medical team and the elderly man was taken to hospital by ambulance, where he was certified to have suffered grievous injuries.Police investigations are ongoing.

title: Man grievously injured in traffic accident
content: A 28-year-old man who lives in Għargħur, at around 0745hrs, was taken to Mater Dei Hospital because he was injured in a traffic accident in Triq ix-Xatt Ta’ Xbiex, Ta’ Xbiex.Preliminary investigations showed that the man was hit by a Toyota IQ, which was being driven by a 52-year-old Italian man residing in Gzira.The man was assisted by a medical team, taken to hospital by ambulance and certified to have sustained grievous injuries.Police investigations are ongoing.

title: Naxxar traffic accident
content: Today, at around 0930hrs, the Police were informed of a traffic accident in Salini Street, Naxxar.Preliminary investigations by the Police showed that the accident occurred between three motorcycles – an Aprilia that was being driven by a 31-year-old man from Qormi, a Honda that was being driven by a 40-year-old man from Mqabba and a Yamaha that was being driven by a 29-year-old man from St Paul’s Bay – as well as a Mercedes that was being driven by a 27-year-old woman.The men, aged 31 and 40, were assisted by a medical team and taken to Mater Dei Hospital by an ambulance. The 40-year-old man was later certified to have sustained serious injuries while the other suffered slight injuries.Magistrate Dr Joe Mifsud LL.D was informed about the case and appointed an inquiry while the Police are investigating the case.

title: Woman grievously injured in traffic accident
content: A 74-year-old woman who lives in Gżira, at around 0930hrs, was taken to Mater Dei Hospital because she was injured in a traffic accident in Triq Tas-Sliema, Gżira.Preliminary investigations showed that the victim was hit by a Toyota Tercel, which was being driven by a 76-year-old man residing in San Ġwann.The woman was assisted by a medical team, taken to hospital by ambulance and certified to have sustained grievous injuries.Police investigations are ongoing.

title: Traffic accident in Tarxien
content: Early this morning, at around 0430 hrs, the Police were informed of a traffic accident in Triq San Anard, Tarxien.Preliminary investigations showed that a 40-year-old man from Tarxien lost control of his Kawasaki motorcycle and overturned. A 33-year-old Latvian woman who resides in Marsascala was also on the bike.A medical team was called on site and an ambulance took the two persons to Mater Dei Hospital, where the man was certified to have sustained grievous injuries while the woman was certified to have sustained serious injuries.Magistrate Dr Ian Farrugia LL.D was informed of the case and appointed an inquiry while the Police are carrying out investigations.

title: Collision between car and motorcycle in Mġarr
content: On Friday the 2nd of May, at around half past three in the afternoon (1530 hrs), the Police were informed of a traffic accident in Triq L-Imġarr, Mġarr.Preliminary investigations showed that a collision occurred between a Toyota Starlet driven by a 54-year-old man from Mosta and a Honda motorcycle driven by a 63-year-old man from Għarb, Gozo.A medical team was called on site and an ambulance took the motorcyclist to Mater Dei Hospital. He was later certified to have sustained serious injuries.Magistrate Dr Ian Farrugia LL.D was informed of the case and appointed an inquiry. Police investigations into the accident are ongoing.

title: Traffic accident in Siggiewi
content: Today, at around 1100hrs, the Police were informed of a traffic accident in Triq il-Kilpa, Siġġiewi.Preliminary investigations showed that a 50-year-old man from Mosta lost control of his bike and crashed into a Toyota Vitz that was being driven by a 55-year-old man from Siggiewi.The cyclist was assisted by a medical team and taken to Mater Dei Hospital by an ambulance. He was later certified to have sustained grievous injuries.The Police are investigating the case.

title: Żejtun traffic accident
content: Today, at around 1130 hrs, the Police were informed of a traffic accident in Triq Alfredo Cachia Zammit, Żejtun.Preliminary investigations showed that a collision occurred between a Skoda Fabia that was being driven by a 58-year-old woman from Zabbar and a Yamaha T115 motorcycle that was being driven by a 66-year-old man from Cospicua. A 56-year-old woman from Cospicua was also on the bike.The driver and the passenger were assisted by a medical team and taken to Mater Dei Hospital by an ambulance. They were later certified to have sustained grievous injuries.The Police are investigating the case.

title: Man grievously injured in a traffic accident
content: A 78-year-old man who lives in Siġġiewi, at around 0630 hrs, was taken to Mater Dei Hospital following a traffic accident in Triq Dun Manwel Zammit, Siġġiewi.Preliminary investigations showed that the man was hit by a Toyota Auris, that was being driven by a 24-year-old man who also lives in Siġġiewi.The man was assisted by a medical team, taken to hospital by an ambulance and certified to have sustained grievous injuries.Police investigations are ongoing.

title: Traffic accident in Gzira
content: Yesterday, at around 1815hrs, the police were informed of a traffic accident in Triq Ix-Xatt, Gzira.The Police went immediately on site and preliminary investigations showed that a collision had occurred between a moped Surron light Bee driven by a 24-year-old man residing in Tarxien and a Honda NSC110 motorcycle driven by a 35-year-old Libyan man residing in Zurrieq.A medical team was called on site and an ambulance took the two men to Mater Dei Hospital. Later, the motorcyclist was certified to have sustained grievous injuries while the other was certified to have suffered slight injuries.Police investigations are ongoing.

title: Two-car accident in Birżebbuġa
content: Yesterday, at about 1745hrs, the Police were informed of a traffic accident in Birżebbuġa Road, Birżebbuġa.Preliminary investigations found that a collision occurred between a Smart driven by a 41-year-old man from Gudja and a Toyota Passo driven by a 36-year-old woman from Żabbar.A medical team was called on site and an ambulance took the man to Mater Dei Hospital. He was later certified to have sustained grievous injuries.Police investigations are ongoing.

title: Motorcycle accident
content: A 65-year-old man, a resident of Mellieħa, was taken to Mater Dei Hospital at about 1015 hrs after he was injured in an accident in Salina Road, Naxxar.Preliminary investigations showed that the man was riding a Honda motorcycle, lost control, crashed into a pavement and fell off.He was assisted by a medical team, taken to hospital by an ambulance and certified thathe was grievously injured.Police investigations are ongoing.

title: Traffic accident in Ħamrun
content: A 62-year-old man and residing in Sliema, at around 0945hrs, was taken to Mater Dei Hospital because he was injured in a traffic accident in St Joseph High Road, Ħamrun.Preliminary investigations showed that a collision occurred between a Renault Captur driven by a 54-year-old woman residing in Birzebbuġa and a Lemoto AURA motorcycle driven by the victim.He was assisted by a medical team, taken to hospital by ambulance and certified to have sustained grievous injuries.Police investigations are ongoing.

title: Man grievously injured in a traffic accident
content: Yesterday, at around 1900 hrs, the Police were informed of a traffic accident in Triq il-Palma, Paola.Preliminary investigations showed that a 68-year-old man, a resident of Paola, was hit by a Renault Clio that was being driven by a 44-year-old man, also a resident of Paola.The victim was assisted by a medical team and taken to Mater Dei Hospital by an ambulance. He was later certified to have sustained grievous injuries.The Police are investigating the case

title: Persons injured in separate traffic accidents
content: Two men were taken to Mater Dei Hospital after being injured in two separate traffic accidents earlier today.The first accident occurred at around 0745hrs, in Triq Anton Cassar, Marsa. Preliminary investigations showed that a collision occurred between a Suzuki motorcycle driven by a 21-year-old man residing in Fgura and a Toyota Vitz driven by a 21-year-old woman residing in Qormi.The second incident happened at around 0800hrs, in Triq Tal-Barrani, Żejtun. Preliminary investigations showed that a 30-year-old Italian man, who lives in Għaxaq, was riding a Yamaha motorcycle, lost control and fell.A medical team assisted in both accidents and the two motorcyclists were taken to hospital by ambulance for medical treatment, where they were certified to have sustained grievous injuries.Police investigations are ongoing.

title: Fatal traffic accident in Marsascala
content: Today at around 1000hrs, the Police were informed of a traffic accident in Triq Villabate, Marsascala.Preliminary investigations showed that a collision occurred between a Peugeot partner that was being driven by a 38-year-old man from Ivory Coast and a resident of Marsa, a Nissan March that was being driven by a 43-year-old Italian and a 67-year-old cyclist from Żejtun. In the Nissan there was also a 38-year-old Italian who was taken to Mater Dei by an ambulance.The cyclist was assisted by a medical team on site but was unfortunately certified dead. The condition of the Italian is not yet known.Magistrate Dr Philip Galea Farrugia LL.D was informed of the case and appointed an inquiry.Police investigations are ongoing.

title: Arrested following a traffic accident in Gozo
content: A 30-year-old Englishman is being detained after he allegedly stole a motorcycle in Gozo and shortly afterwards was involved in a collision with the same motorcycle.At around 1330 hrs, the Police were informed of a traffic accident in Triq L-Għarb, Għarb. Police went immediately on site where they found that an accident had occurred between two motorcycles, a Honda and a Kymco, and the Honda driver, a 34-year-old man from Xagħra, needed medical assistance.At this point, persons who were on site informed the police that the Kymco driver, probably a British national, fled the scene. A search immediately began, and shortly afterwards he was found in the vicinity of the accident and was arrested. During the arrest he was aggressive towards the police, who were not injured.During investigations, the Police found that the Kymco motorcycle had just been stolen from Sannat, allegedly from the same British man who was involved in the traffic accident and then fled the scene.The two men were taken to the Gozo General Hospital because of the injuries they sustained in the accident, where the 34-year-old man was later certified to have sustained grievous injuries, while the condition of the arrested person is still pending.Police investigations into this case are ongoing.

title: Woman grievously injured in traffic accident
content: A 60-year-old woman residing in Swieqi, at around 1115hrs, was taken to Mater Dei Hospital because she was injured in a traffic accident in Triq E. Bradford corner with Triq il-Kappella tax-Xagħra, Naxxar.Preliminary investigations showed that the woman was hit by a Volkswagen Polo driven by a 48-year-old woman who lives in Mosta.The victim was assisted by a medical team, taken to hospital by ambulance and certified to have sustained grievous injuries.Police investigations are ongoing.

title: Fgura traffic accident
content: Update:Unfortunately, the 24-year-old woman recently lost her life at Mater Dei Hospital.The Magisterial Inquiry and Police investigations are ongoing.Earlier:Yesterday, at around 2000hrs, two women, aged 34 and 24 from Nepal, were taken to Mater Dei Hospital after being injured in a traffic accident in Triq Hompesh, Fgura.It resulted from initial investigations that the two women were hit by a Toyota Hilux that was being driven by a 20-year-old woman from Birżebbuġa.The victims were assisted by a medical team and taken to hospital by an ambulance where the 24-year-old woman was later certified to have sustained grievous injuries while the other woman was certified to have sustained grievous injuries.Magistrate Ian Farrugia LL.D was informed about the case who opened an inquiry while Police investigations are still ongoing.

title: Fgura traffic accident
content: Today, at around 1530hrs, the Police were informed of a traffic accident in Hompesch Street, Fgura.Preliminary investigations showed that a collision occurred between a Toyota Corolla driven by a 23-year-old woman from Zabbar and an Audi Q3 driven by a 77-year-old man from Marsascala.In the Toyota there was also a 71-year-old woman residing in Zabbar while in the Audi there were also two women aged 76 and 42 years, both residing in Marsascala, and two boys aged 14 and 11 years.Members of the Civil Protection Department and a medical team were called to the scene and ambulances took all the persons to Mater Dei Hospital for treatment.Unfortunately, the 71-year-old woman was certified dead a short while later while the 23-year-old woman is in serious condition, the 77-year-old man and the 76-year-old woman were certified to have sustained grievous injuries.The condition of the other persons is still pending.Magistrate Dr Ian Farrugia LL.D was informed of the case and appointed an inquiry.Police investigations into this incident are ongoing.

title: Boy seriously injured in Buġibba accident
content: A 5-year-old boy sustained serious injuries after he was hit by a vehicle in Triq iċ-Ċern earlier today at around fifteen minutes past one in the afternoon (1315 hrs).From initial investigations it appears that he suffered head injuries when he was hit by the mirror of a Volkswagen Polo mirror which was being driven by a 22-year-old man from Msida.A medical team assisted the boy and was immediately taken to Mater Dei Hospital by ambulance.Magistrate Dr Philip Galea Farrugia LL. D. was informed and appointed an inquiry into the case while Police investigations are ongoing.

title: Traffic accident
content: This morning, at around 0530 hrs, the Police were informed of a traffic accident in Triq L-Imġarr, Qala, Gozo.The Police went immediately on site and from preliminary investigations it resulted that a collision had occurred between a Kia Picanto that was being driven by a 53-year-old woman from Qala and a Honda NSC motorcycle that was being driven by a 47-year-old man, a resident of Nadur.A medical team was called on site and an ambulance took the motorcyclist to Gozo General Hospital. He was later certified to have sustained grievous injuries.Police investigations are ongoing.

title: Man grievously injured in traffic accident
content: A 63-year-old man who lives in Żurrieq, at around 1930hrs, was taken to Mater Dei Hospital because he was injured in a traffic accident in Blue Grotto Avenue, Żurrieq.Preliminary investigations showed that the man was hit by a Citroen Saxo, which was being driven by a 19-year-old man residing in Luqa.The man was assisted by a medical team, taken to hospital by ambulance and certified to have sustained grievous injuries.Police investigations are ongoing.

title: Persons injured in separate traffic accidents
content: Three people were taken to Mater Dei Hospital after being injured in two separate traffic accidents yesterday.The first accident occurred at around 1415hrs, in Triq il-Marfa, Mellieħa. Preliminary investigations showed that a 50-year-old woman residing in Rabat, Gozo, lost control of the Toyota Ractis she was driving and crashed into an electricity pole. The woman was accompanied by a 29-year-old man who lives in Rabat, Gozo.The second incident happened at around 2345hrs, in Triq il-Kappillan Mifsud, Ħamrun. Preliminary investigations showed that a 23-year-old man from Santa Venera had sustained injuries after he was allegedly hit by a vehicle which drove on while he was driving a Suzuki motorcycle.A medical team provided assistance in both incidents and all persons were taken to hospital by ambulance for medical treatment. The woman and the motorcyclist were later certified to have been grievously injured, while the other man was certified to have suffered slight injuries.Police investigations are ongoing.

title: Motorcycle accident in Paola
content: A 26-year-old Indian man and residing in Floriana, at around 2200hrs, was taken to Mater Dei Hospital because he was injured in a traffic accident in Triq Kordin, Paola.Preliminary investigations showed that the man was riding a Hyosung Karion motorcycle, lost control and fell.He was assisted by a medical team, taken to hospital by ambulance and certified to have sustained grievous injuries.Police investigations are ongoing.

title: Young woman seriously injured in traffic accident
content: A 17-year-old girl, residing in Qormi, yesterday, at around 1730hrs, was taken to Mater Dei Hospital because she was injured in a traffic accident in Triq il-Marfa, Mellieha.Preliminary investigations showed that the girl was hit by a Jeep Grand Cherokee driven by a 52-year-old man who lives in Zejtun. Consequently, the Jeep also hit a Honda Civic which was parked.The victim was assisted by a medical team, taken to hospital by ambulance and certified to be seriously injured.Magistrate Dr Ian Farrugia LL.D was informed of the case and appointed an inquiry.Police investigations are ongoing.

title: Man grievously injured in traffic accident
content: A 36-year-old Albanian man, from Marsascala, was taken to Mater Dei Hospital at around 1000 hrs following a traffic accident in Triq Għar Dalam, Birzebbugia.From initial investigations, it appears that the victim was hit by a Toyota Dyna van, which was being driven by a 59-year-old man from Marsa.The Albanian was assisted by a medical team and taken to hospital by an ambulance, where he was certified to have sustained grievous injuries.Police investigations are ongoing.

title: Traffic accident in Siġġiewi
content: Yesterday, at around 2:30 p.m. (1430hrs), the Police were informed of a traffic accident in Triq Ta’ Lawrenti, Siġġiewi.Police immediately went to the scene, and from preliminary investigations it resulted that a collision had occurred between a Smart Fortwo driven by a 34-year-old woman from Mellieħa and a Volvo XC40 driven by a 38-year-old man from Qrendi.A medical team was called to the site, and the woman was taken to Mater Dei Hospital by ambulance. Later, she was certified as having sustained grevious injuries.Police investigations are still ongoing.

title: Woman greviously injured in traffic accident
content: A 36-year-old Italian woman, resident in St Paul’s Bay, was taken to Mater Dei Hospital at around 8:45 a.m. due to injuries sustained in a traffic accident in Triq Sant’ Andrija, St Julian’s.Preliminary investigations showed that while she was riding a Kymco Like motorcycle, lost control and fell, subsequently colliding with a Toyota Tercel that was being driven in the same direction by a 71-year-old man from San Ġwann.She was assisted by a medical team and taken to the hospital by ambulance, where she was later certified as having sustained grevious injuries.Police investigations are still ongoing.

title: Motorcyclist injured in traffic accident
content: Early this morning, at around half past five (0530 hrs), the Police were informed that a traffic accident had occurred in Triq Sir Anthony Mamo, Birkirkara.Preliminary investigations showed that a collision took place between a Nissan March and a Honda motorcycle driven by a 57-year-old man, resident in Msida.The man was assisted by a medical team on site and taken to hospital by ambulance, where he was later certified to have sustained serious injuries.In the Nissan there was a 25-year-old woman from St Paul’s Bay who was not injured but was taken to hospital due to shock, while the Police are looking for a man who allegedly was also in the Nissan at the time of the accident, but who allegedly left the scene.Magistrate Dr Monica Borg Galea LL.D was informed and appointed an inquiry, while the Police are carrying out investigations.

title: Collision between car and motorcycle in Attard
content: Today, at around 0830hrs, the Police were informed of a traffic accident in Triq Żagħfran, Ħ’Attard.Preliminary investigations showed that a collision occurred between a Toyota Passo driven by a 19-year-old woman residing in Birkirkara and a Kawazaki motorcycle driven by a 31-year-old man also living in Birkirkara.A medical team was called on site and an ambulance took the motorcyclist to Mater Dei Hospital. He was later certified to be seriously injured.Magistrate Dr Ian Farrugia LL. D was informed of the case and appointed an inquiry, while Police investigations are ongoing.

title: Gozo traffic accident
content: Yesterday, at around 1700 hrs, the Police were informed about a traffic accident occurred in Triq ix-Xagħra, Xagħra, Gozo.The Police went immediately on site and from preliminary investigations, it resulted that a collision had occurred between a Hyundai that was being driven by a 74-year-old man from Xagħra and a Nissan that was being driven by a 33 years old Albanian national. A 73-year-old woman from Xagħra was also present in the Hyundai.A medical team was summoned to the scene and an ambulance took the three persons to theGozo General hospital . The men were later certified as suffering from slight injuries while the woman was certified with grievous injuries.Police investigations into the accident are ongoing.

title: Van-motorcycle collision in Marsaxlokk
content: Today, at around 1100hrs, the Police were informed of a traffic accident in Triq Melqart, Marsaxlokk.Preliminary investigations showed that a collision occurred between a Ford Transit driven by a 30-year-old man from Ħaż-Żabbar and a Kymco motorcycle driven by a 35-year-old French man.A medical team was called on site and an ambulance took the motorcycle driver to Mater Dei Hospital, where he was certified to be grievously injured.Police investigations are ongoing.

title: Woman grievously injured in a traffic accident
content: An 87-year-old woman, who lives in Qormi, at around 0730 hrs, was taken Mater Dei Hospital since she was involved in a traffic accident in Cottoner Avenue, Fgura.Initial investigations, showed that the woman was hit by Mitsubishi L200, that was being driven by a 68-year-old man from Qormi.The woman was assisted by a medical team, taken to Mater Dei hospital by an ambulance and was later certified as suffering from grievous injuries.Police investigations are ongoing.

title: Traffic accident in Gozo
content: Yesterday, at around 2100hrs, the Police were informed of a traffic accident in Triq ir-Rabat, Żebbuġ, Gozo.The Police immediately went to the scene and from a preliminary investigation it was revealed that a 25-year-old Macedonian resident of Żebbuġ, Gozo, lost control of the Isuzu WFR van he was driving and fell into a valley about one and a half stories high. In the van, there was a 36-year-old compatriot also resident of Żebbuġ, Gozo.Members of the Civil Protection and a medical team were called to the scene to assist. An ambulance took the men to the Gozo General Hospital to receive the necessary treatment, where they were certified with grievous injuries.Police investigations are still ongoing.

title: Motorcycle accident in St Paul’s Bay
content: Update:Unfortunately, the 54-year-old Englishman recently lost his life at Mater Dei Hospital.The Magisterial Inquiry and Police investigations are ongoing.Earlier: A 54-year-old Englishman resident in Mellieħa, at around 1700hrs, was taken to Mater Dei Hospital because he was injured in a traffic accident in Dawret San Pawl, St Paul’s Bay.Preliminary investigations showed that the man was riding a Honda motorcycle, lost control and crashed into a skip which was stationary on the road.He was assisted by a medical team, taken to hospital by ambulance and certified to be seriously injured.Magistrate Dr Ian Farrugia LL.D was informed of the case and appointed an inquiry.Police investigations are ongoing.

title: Two policemen injured in Tarxien accident
content: Two police officers were grievously injured last night when they were involved in an accident while following a vehicle which left the scene at excessive speed after the driver noticed the presence of the police.At around 0130hrs, the Police were asked to assist on an argument in Żurrieq. Upon arriving in the vicinity, they noticed a person who was involved in the case fleeing the scene with a BMW.The police therefore followed this vehicle and as soon as they arrived in Triq is-Sorijiet, Tarxien, the Corps vehicle, Hyundai Tucson, was involved in a collision with a Fiat 500, driven by a 25-year-old woman residing in Tarxien. The two policemen were taken to Mater Dei Hospital for treatment and were certified to be suffering from grievous injuries, while the woman suffered slight injuries.Six parked vehicles were hit as a result of the impact.A number of persons are being spoken to by the Police about the case.Police investigations into this case are ongoing.

title: Traffic accident in Marsaxlokk
content: Today, at around 0800hrs, the Police were informed of a traffic accident in Triq Marsaxlokk, Marsaxlokk.Preliminary investigations showed that a 35-year-old Libyan man from Msida lost control of the Toyota Yaris he was driving and crashed into a pole and a wall. Another 28-year-old Libyan national, a resident of Swieqi, was also in the vehicle.A medical team was called on site and an ambulance took the 28-year-old man to Mater Dei Hospital. He was later certified to have sustained grievous injuries.Police investigations are ongoing.

title: Car-motorcycle collision in Zebbug
content: Yesterday, at around 1830hrs, the police were informed of a traffic accident in Attard Road, Zebbug.Preliminary investigations showed that a collision occurred between a Peugeot 2008 driven by a 32-year-old residing in Balzan and a Benelli motorcycle driven by a 28-year-old residing in Siggiewi.A medical team was called on site and an ambulance took the motorcyclist to Mater Dei where he was certified to have sustained grievous injuries.Police investigations are ongoing.

title: Sliema traffic accident
content: Yesterday, at around 1800 hrs, the Police were informed of a traffic accident in Triq Rodolfu, Sliema.Preliminary investigation showed that a collision occurred between a Dacia Duster that was being driven by a 47-year-old Filipino man from Santa Venera and a Kymco Agility motorcycle that was being driven by a 51-year-old man from Sliema.The biker was assisted by a medical team and taken to Mater Dei Hospital by an ambulance for further medical attention. He was later certified to have sustained grievous injuries.The Police are investigating the case.

title: Woman seriously injured in traffic accident
content: On Thursday 19th June, at around one and a quarter in the afternoon (1315 hrs), the Police were informed of a traffic accident at Pinto Wharf, Floriana.Preliminary investigations by the Police found that a 57-year-old German woman was hit by a Toyota Ractis driven by a 52-year-old man from Żabbar.A medical team was called on site and an ambulance took the woman to Mater Dei Hospital. She was certified to have sustained serious injuries.Ms Antoine Agius Bonnici LL. Mr D. appointed an inquiry while Police investigations into the incident are ongoing.

title: Motorcycle accident in Attard
content: A 52-year-old man and residing in Ħaż-Żebbuġ, at around 0900hrs, was taken to Mater Dei Hospital because he was injured in a traffic accident in Vjal L-Istadium Nazzjonali in Ta’ Qali, Attard.Preliminary investigations showed that the man was riding a Kymco motorcycle, lost control and fell.He was assisted by a medical team, taken to hospital by ambulance and certified to have sustained grievous injuries.Police investigations are ongoing.

title: Naxxar traffic accident
content: Today, at around 1045hrs, the Police were informed of a traffic accident in Triq il-Ġermanja, Naxxar.The Police went immediately on site and preliminary investigations showed that a 78-year-old woman who resides in Naxxar, lost control of the Toyota Vitz she was driving and crashed into a parked truck.The victim was assisted by a medical team, taken to Mater Dei Hospital by ambulance and certified to be seriously injured.Magistrate Dr Joe Mifsud LL.D was informed of the case and appointed an inquiry.Civil Protection Department personnel were also on site to assist.The Police are carrying out investigations on the case.

title: Żebbuġ traffic accident
content: Today, at around 0800hrs, the Police were informed that their assistance was needed in Vjal il-Helsien, Zebbug.Preliminary investigations by the Police showed that a 68-year-old man and a 64-year-old woman, both residents of Żebbuġ, sustained injuries after they were hit by a Peugeot 306 that was being driven by a 59-year-old man from Żebbuġ.A medical team was called on site and an ambulance took both victims to Mater Dei Hospital for treatment. The woman was later certified that she suffered grievous injuries while the man suffered slight injuries.Police investigations are ongoing.

title: Collision between a car and e-scooter
content: Yesterday, at around 2215 hrs, the Police were informed of a traffic accident in Triq il-Wied ta’ Birkirkara, Birkirkara.Preliminary investigations showed that a collision occurred between a Mazda Demio that was being driven by a 41-year-old man from Birkirkara and an e-scooter that was being driven by a 17-year-old man from Birkirkara.A medical team was called on site and an ambulance took the 17-year-old driver to Mater Dei Hospital, where he was certified to have sustained grievous injuries.The Police are carrying out investigations.

title: Traffic accident in Gwardamanġa
content: Today, at around 0700hrs, the Police were informed of a traffic accident in St Luke’s Square, Gwardamanġa.The Police went immediately on site and preliminary investigations showed that a collision had occurred between a Volkswagen Caddy driven by a 62-year-old man residing in Mellieħa and a Mercedes Benz E320, which was stationary at the side of the road. Consequently, the Mercedes moved forward and hit a 41-year-old woman residing in Valletta.Members of the Civil Protection Department and a medical team were called to the scene and ambulances took the two persons to Mater Dei Hospital for treatment. They were later certified to have sustained grievous injuries.Police investigations into this incident are ongoing.
